Articles.Content:
I need larger fairings for some payloads (5m)

Is it possible to rescale Squards procedural fairings (and keep them procedural)?

If so, how can i do that?
This should be possible by editing the maxRadius value in the cfg.

Alternatively, [SpaceY](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100408-1-0-2-SpaceY-Heavy-Lifter-Parts-Pack-v0-13-%282015-05-09%29) has 5m procedural fairings using the stock module (instead of whatever Procedural Fairings uses). It also has 5m fuel tanks, engines, and other rocket parts to help you get whatever 5m monstrosity you're building into orbit. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
